title: Data Rights Request
description: This document defines a format for interoperability of Data Rights Requests

rights-request-id.description: Unique Identifier of the Rights Request

transitivity.description: Transitivity of the Data Rights Request. One of {DOWNWARD,UPWARD,BIDIRECTIONAL,INTRANSITIVE}.

date.description: Date and Time of the request

reply-to.description: Mode of Reply - to the SYSTEM that the Rights Request was received from or to the USER Data Subject directly
